sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3100 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , FINA_SEQN , IMDE_GBCD , FINA_CODE , FINA_NAME , ACNT_NUMB , ICNM_YEAR , PAYT_AMNT , DEDU_AMNT , IMDE_TXCD , FINA_TXCD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #systemkey# , #finaSeqn# , #imdeGbcd# , #finaCode# , #finaName# , #acntNumb# , #icnmYear# , #paytAmnt# , #deduAmnt# , #imdeTxcd# , #finaTxcd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )

INSERT INTO YETA3100 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , FINA_SEQN , IMDE_GBCD , FINA_CODE , FINA_NAME , ACNT_NUMB , ICNM_YEAR , PAYT_AMNT , DEDU_AMNT , IMDE_TXCD , FINA_TXCD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #systemkey# , (SELECT (NVL(MAX(FINA_SEQN),0) + 1) FROM YETA3100 AA WHERE AA.EDAC_RVYY = #edacRvyy# AND AA.SETT_GBCD = #settGbcd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# ) , #imdeGbcd# , ( SELECT COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 WHERE RPSTTV_CD = 'Y005' AND MANGE_ITEM11 = #finaCode# ) , #finaName# , #acntNumb# , #icnmYear# , #paytAmnt# , #deduAmnt# , #imdeTxcd# , #finaTxcd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3100 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , FINA_SEQN=#finaSeqn# , IMDE_GBCD=#imdeGbcd# , FINA_CODE=#finaCode# , FINA_NAME=#finaName# , ACNT_NUMB=#acntNumb# , ICNM_YEAR=#icnmYear# , PAYT_AMNT=#paytAmnt# , DEDU_AMNT=#deduAmnt# , IMDE_TXCD=#imdeTxcd# , FINA_TXCD=#finaTxcd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FINA_SEQN=#finaSeqn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FINA_SEQN=#finaSeqn#
DELETE FROM YETA3100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND IMDE_GBCD=#imdeGbcd#

DELETE FROM YETA3100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , FINA_SEQN , IMDE_GBCD , FINA_CODE , FINA_NAME , ACNT_NUMB , ICNM_YEAR , PAYT_AMNT , DEDU_AMNT , IMDE_TXCD , FINA_TXCD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FINA_SEQN=#finaSeqn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , FINA_SEQN , IMDE_GBCD , FINA_CODE , FINA_NAME , ACNT_NUMB , ICNM_YEAR , PAYT_AMNT , DEDU_AMNT , IMDE_TXCD , FINA_TXCD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , FINA_SEQN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
